requirement_completeness.rationale: The requirement doesn't specify the minimum specifications for the Windows PC, the protocols to be used for interfacing, access control measures, or the specific purpose of these interfaces. These details are necessary for proper implementation.

requirement_completeness.requirement_text: The LSF shall be designed for transportability by LC-130 or C-130 Hercules aircraft to McMurdo Station.
requirement_completeness.suggested_improvement: The LSF shall be designed for transportability by LC-130 or C-130 Hercules aircraft to McMurdo Station, with maximum weight of X pounds, dimensions not exceeding Y×Z feet when prepared for transport, and requiring no more than W hours of preparation time before transport.
requirement_completeness.rationale: The requirement doesn't specify weight limitations, dimension constraints when prepared for transport, or the time required to prepare the facility for transport. These details are necessary for transport planning and verification.

requirement_completeness.requirement_text: The LSF shall also be designed for transport by helicopter, truck, or sleds pulled by ground vehicles.
missing_elements: Specific transportability criteria for each mode
requirement_completeness.suggested_improvement: The LSF shall also be designed for transport by helicopter (compatible with models X, Y, Z, with maximum weight A lbs), truck (standard flatbed with dimensions B×C feet), or sleds pulled by ground vehicles (maximum weight D lbs, dimensions E×F feet), with disassembly into components requiring no more than G hours by a team of H people.
requirement_completeness.rationale: The requirement doesn't specify weight and dimension constraints for each transport mode, compatibility with specific vehicle types, or requirements for disassembly if needed. These details are necessary for transport planning and verification.

requirement_completeness.requirement_text: Provide accommodation with at least five beds and one mobile cot.

requirement_completeness.suggested_improvement: Provide accommodation with at least five beds (minimum dimensions X×Y feet, weight capacity Z lbs) and one mobile cot (dimensions A×B feet, weight capacity C lbs), with minimum spacing of D feet between beds and provisions for privacy such as curtains or dividers.
requirement_completeness.rationale: The requirement doesn't specify the size and weight capacity of the beds and cot, spacing requirements between beds, or provisions for privacy. These details are necessary for proper implementation and comfort.

requirement_completeness.suggested_improvement: The facility shall include at least one shower with water usage not exceeding X gallons per minute, temperature control between 60-120°F, accessibility features compliant with ADA standards, and privacy enclosure with locking mechanism.

requirement_completeness.suggested_improvement: The facility shall include at least one toilet with water usage not exceeding X gallons per flush, connected to the waste management system, accessibility features compliant with ADA standards, and privacy enclosure with locking mechanism.

requirement_completeness.requirement_text: The facility shall have at least two sinks.
requirement_completeness.suggested_improvement: The facility shall have at least two sinks with water usage not exceeding X gallons per minute, hot and cold water temperature control, with one located in the bathroom area and one in the kitchen area, for personal hygiene and food preparation respectively.

missing_elements: Specific details on equipment or process

requirement_completeness.suggested_improvement: The facility shall include at least one washing machine with minimum capacity of X lbs, water usage not exceeding Y gallons per load, Energy Star rating or equivalent, and multiple cycle options including normal, heavy duty, and delicate settings.

requirement_completeness.requirement_text: The facility shall be equipped with at least one first aid kit.
requirement_completeness.suggested_improvement: The facility shall be equipped with at least one first aid kit meeting ANSI/ISEA Z308.1 Type A standards, containing supplies for treating common injuries and conditions, located in an easily accessible central location, with contents checked and replenished monthly.

requirement_completeness.requirement_text: The facility shall have at least one set of AED defibrillators compliant with 29 CFR 1915.87 (OSHA Maritime).
requirement_completeness.suggested_improvement: The facility shall have at least one set of AED defibrillators compliant with 29 CFR 1915.87 (OSHA Maritime), located in a central, easily accessible location, with monthly maintenance checks and documentation, and all facility personnel trained in their use.
requirement_completeness.rationale: The requirement doesn't specify location requirements, maintenance procedures, or training requirements for personnel. These details are necessary for proper implementation and emergency preparedness.

requirement_completeness.requirement_text: The facility shall provide a minimum of 100 square feet of space for physical exercise.
requirement_completeness.suggested_improvement: The facility shall provide a minimum of 100 square feet of space for physical exercise, with non-slip flooring, minimum ceiling height of 8 feet, and equipped with at least [specific exercise equipment] suitable for maintaining physical fitness in confined spaces.

requirement_completeness.requirement_text: The facility shall provide a minimum of 100 square feet of space for eating.

requirement_completeness.requirement_text: The facility shall include at least one table and five chairs.
requirement_completeness.suggested_improvement: The facility shall include at least one table (minimum dimensions X×Y feet, height Z inches, weight capacity A lbs) and five chairs (each with weight capacity B lbs), constructed of durable, easy-to-clean materials, for use in the eating area specified in REQ-031.

requirement_completeness.requirement_text: Provide food storage with at least three refrigeration/freezer units.
missing_elements: Clarification on whether three is total or split between refrigeration and freezing
requirement_completeness.suggested_improvement: Provide food storage with at least three refrigeration/freezer units, with a combined minimum capacity of X cubic feet for refrigeration (33-40°F) and Y cubic feet for freezing (0 to -10°F), Energy Star rated or equivalent, configured to maintain food safety during power fluctuations.
requirement_completeness.rationale: The requirement doesn't specify capacity requirements, temperature ranges, energy efficiency standards, or configuration needs for power reliability. These details are necessary for proper implementation and food safety.

requirement_completeness.requirement_text: The refrigeration system shall provide at least 48 cubic feet of refrigeration space.
requirement_completeness.suggested_improvement: The refrigeration system shall provide at least 48 cubic feet of refrigeration space, maintaining temperatures between 33-40°F, with Energy Star rating or equivalent, and configured with adjustable shelving to accommodate various food storage needs.
requirement_completeness.rationale: The requirement specifies capacity but doesn't address temperature range, energy efficiency requirements, or configuration options. These details are necessary for proper implementation and food safety.

requirement_completeness.requirement_text: The freezer system shall provide at least 19.5 cubic feet of freezer space.
requirement_completeness.suggested_improvement: The freezer system shall provide at least 19.5 cubic feet of freezer space, maintaining temperatures between 0 to -10°F, with Energy Star rating or equivalent, and configured with adjustable shelving to accommodate various food storage needs.
requirement_completeness.rationale: The requirement specifies capacity but doesn't address temperature range, energy efficiency requirements, or configuration options. These details are necessary for proper implementation and food safety.

requirement_completeness.requirement_text: The facility shall include at least a two-burner table-top stove.
requirement_completeness.suggested_improvement: The facility shall include at least a two-burner table-top stove, powered by [electricity/propane/etc.], with automatic shut-off safety features, located under appropriate ventilation, and with dimensions not exceeding X×Y×Z inches to fit on available counter space.
requirement_completeness.rationale: The requirement doesn't specify the power source, required safety features, ventilation requirements, or size constraints. These details are necessary for proper implementation, safety, and space planning.

requirement_completeness.requirement_text: The facility shall monitor energy consumption using an electricity usage monitor.
requirement_completeness.suggested_improvement: The facility shall monitor energy consumption using an electricity usage monitor with accuracy of ±2%, recording data at 15-minute intervals, storing at least 30 days of historical data, and generating daily and weekly usage reports accessible through the control system.
requirement_completeness.rationale: The requirement doesn't specify monitoring frequency, data storage duration, reporting capabilities, or accuracy requirements. These details are necessary for proper implementation and usefulness of the monitoring system.

requirement_completeness.requirement_text: The facility shall generate a daily report on energy consumption.
requirement_completeness.suggested_improvement: The facility shall generate a daily report on energy consumption, including total kWh used, peak demand time, breakdown by major systems, presented in both tabular and graphical formats, delivered to the control system by 01:00 daily, and retained for at least 90 days.
requirement_completeness.rationale: The requirement doesn't specify what information should be included in the report, the format, how it should be delivered, or how long reports should be retained. These details are necessary for proper implementation and usefulness of the reporting system.

requirement_completeness.requirement_text: The facility shall conserve energy by utilizing motion sensor switches and outlets.
requirement_completeness.suggested_improvement: The facility shall conserve energy by utilizing motion sensor switches and outlets in all common areas and bathrooms, with adjustable sensitivity settings, automatic shut-off after 15 minutes of no detected motion, and manual override capability for essential systems.
requirement_completeness.rationale: The requirement doesn't specify where the motion sensors should be installed, their sensitivity settings, timing for automatic shut-off, or whether manual overrides are possible. These details are necessary for proper implementation and usability.

requirement_completeness.requirement_text: The facility shall store fuel in accordance with EPA's SPCC (40 CFR Part 112) requirements.
requirement_completeness.suggested_improvement: The facility shall store diesel, propane, and other necessary fuel types in accordance with EPA's SPCC (40 CFR Part 112) requirements, with a minimum storage capacity sufficient for X days of operation at full load.
requirement_completeness.rationale: The requirement references the appropriate regulations but doesn't specify which fuel types will be stored or the required storage capacity. These details are necessary for proper implementation and operational planning.

requirement_completeness.requirement_text: The facility shall withstand wind speeds up to 250 mph.
